messages.subject: Was: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest: for Michele
messages.msgSnippet: . The woman ... Michele, Congratulation!  What and encouragement your experience is for me. Would you be willing to share your record keeping habits with us?
messages.messageBody:
. The woman
> actually said I had too much information and kept very good records of
> what my two boys and I had done for unschooling. I am SO relieved that
> the process went so well.

Michele, Congratulation! What and encouragement your experience is for me.
Would you be willing to share your record keeping habits with us? Did you
use a portfolio - if so, what did it look like, and what did you include?
Can you also share a bit about the types of information/activities that you
recorded. If you included samples of work, what type of work was it?
Thanks so much, Annette
